items.question: What can you build for my business?

paragraphs: We build web apps, mobile apps, Telegram bots, and AI solutions of any complexity.
From simple landing pages to complex CRMs with analytics and automation.
Mid-size projects (web apps, mobile apps): 1-2 months
We confirm exact timelines after the technical scope.
Frontend: React, Next.js, Vue, React Native, Tanstack, Tailwind CSS
Backend: Node.js, NestJS, Python (FastAPI), Go (Gin), PostgreSQL, MongoDB
AI/ML: Python, TensorFlow, OpenAI API, RAG, Qdrant, Pgvector, Modal
The price depends on scope and complexity.
We calculate the exact cost after we discuss the project.

footer.description: We build smart products: chatbots, web services, and mobile apps for your business goals.

reviews.text: We launched a multifunctional landing page for StrategicLaw Group: leads started on day one, the CRM connected without issues.
The mobile app and CRM for Zeep Coffee automated orders and delivery—customers order faster and the team handles more.
For the Frito fast-food chain we built an online menu, payments, and a bot. The average check grew and repeat orders increased noticeably.
CRM and chatbots for AGRO SOLUTIONS LTD (Astana, ba.prg.kz) automated sales of agro equipment and customer management—the team sees every deal online.
